page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: We couldn't let the opportunity pass without telling you something about our recreational activities. There is quite a lot you can do in the countryside that you can't do in built up areas. We conducted a survey of all the pupils at our school to discover children's favourite activities. We stressed the word ACTIVITY and we did not allow responses such as watching TV, playing video games etc. Many pastimes are outdoor activities. Quite a lot of us have different favourite sporting activities; we have grouped all these under one heading of "Sport". The results are as follows:- Swimming 24% Sport 22% Cycling 20% Walking 16% Fishing 11% Ornithology 7% One reason that swimming is so popular is because the school PTA have two swimming sessions per week at the local secondary school pool. Many of us go!
